about_the_game:
JOIN US ON DISCORD!

WISHLIST Kaiju Fishing right now!

ABOUT THE GAME

Play as Runa, a young fisherwoman on a quest to restore balance to the oceans. With only your boat and lovable pet lizard Skipper, explore a magical world to meet new friends, catch incredible fish, and learn new skills. Defeat the massive, mythical monsters and become the greatest angler of all time!

FEATURES

CATCH EPIC KAIJU BOSSES!

Kaiju Fishing features four main Kaiju bosses and plenty of Large Fish that will also put up a heck of a fight. Summon them to their unique arenas and defeat them in dramatic fashion! (And yes, of course you can keep the Kaiju!)

COMBAT FISHING

Engage in an exciting new way to fish, where the creatures pull the boat as you dodge attacks and reel closer to victory. Master your skills, find new equipment, and conquer the largest monsters in the sea!

COLLECT THEM ALL!

From small fry to towering Kaiju, there are dozens of fish to collect in Kaiju Fishing. With unique rarities, special variants, and larger encounters, Runa will have to master her techniques. Keep your favorite catches in your Fish Tank and show them off!

CRAFT THE PERFECT BAIT

Find resources around each zone to craft different baits. Each type of bait increases your chance of success and will be necessary to find them all!

EXPLORE THE VAST OCEAN

The seas of Kaiju Fishing are vast and varied, featuring three main areas for players to explore. Each zone has its own set of fish and epic Kaiju. Enjoy the cool breeze in the tropical zone, brace yourself for the icy tundra, and try not to get burned near the magma pools by the volcano.

MAKE NEW FRIENDS TO TACKLE QUESTS

From humble garbage collectors cleaning the oceans, to shopkeepers, to squishable Seals - Kaiju Fishing has lovable and bizarre characters to help you on your journey! Help them with quests to earn new gear and complete special encounters.

SECRETS AWAIT!

Solve environment puzzles to find special fishing zones and cast your line into mysterious portals that appear... you might be surprised what you find!

STAY UP TO DATE

Right now, we're still hard at work developing Kaiju Fishing. You can download and play the Kaiju Fishing DEMO right now. We have more updates planned for the Demo, so stay tuned!

If you want more, you can follow our updates on Twitter @mutantstudios or find us on Discord. We post updates just about every week. Thanks for checking out Kaiju Fishing, we'll see you on the high seas!
